description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The History of America ... A new edition; to which is added, a continuation, comprising the history of the colonies from 1652 to the present time ... By David McIntosh, LL.D. [With maps and engraved plates, including a portrait.]]" Author: ROBERTSON, William - D.D., the Historian Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1061.f.25." Volume: 02 Page: 2 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1817 Edition: Thirteenth edition, in which is included the History of Virginia to the year 1668, and of New England to ... 1652. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003121083 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'.
